posts.postText: Well I know I havent been on for a long time but I feel like I could do a great job as admin seeing as most people dont take it seriously on the server.I also know that many people think I should be an admin because I am a good warden and I know the rules. So if you can please consider me as an admin because I have been admin at least 2 or 3 times on a Team Fortress 2 server.

I think Katkong should be admin. I can back him up that he knows the server rules well. I noticed he does take everything seriously and does not let anything slide by. He's also a pretty nice person ^^. Anyway, I don't think it would be wrong to give him Admin at all.

We are currently accepting moderators for jail, if you want to apply for it just go here
 http://www.nonerdsjustgeeks.com/forum/viewforum.php?f=16 

Follow the format and get the reccomendations.
